H0.text: Quieter is the sound that results when a student playing the drums hits the drums with greater force.

H1.text: Louder is the sound that results when a student playing the drums hits the drums with greater force.

H2.text: Lower in pitch is the sound produced when a student playing the drums hits the drums with greater force.

H3.text: Higher in pitch is the sound produced when a student playing the drums hits the drums with greater force.

A4.text: The pitch of lower tones gets lower as sound pressure increases.

A5.text: For instance, a tone of 200 Hz that is very loud seems one semitone lower in pitch than if it is just barely audible.
